title:
Weighted estimates for Schr\"odinger--Calder\'on--Zygmund operators with
  exponential decay
authors: Estefan\'ia Dalmasso, Gabriela R. Lezama and Marisa Toschi
abstract:
In this work we obtain weighted boundedness results for singular integral
operators with kernels exhibiting exponential decay. We also show that the
classes of weights are characterized by a suitable maximal operator.
Additionally, we study the boundedness of various operators associated with the
generalized Schr\"odinger operator $-\Delta + \mu$, where $\mu$ is a
nonnegative Radon measure in $\mathbb{R}^d$, for $d\geq 3$.
